title: Daylight
lyrics: Here I am waiting Why am I holding on We knew this day would come How did it come so fast This is our last night But it's late And I'm trying not to sleep Cause I know When I wake I will have to slip away And when the daylight comes I'll have to go But tonight I'm gonna hold you so close Cause in the daylight we'll be on our own But tonight I need to hold you so close Oh-woah, Oh-woah, Oh-woah Ohhhhhh Oh-woah, Oh-woah, Oh-woah Ohhhhhh Here I am staring In my arms So beautiful The sky is getting bright Somebody Slow it down This is way too hard Cause I know When the sun comes up I will leave This is my last glance That will soon be memory I never wanted to stop Start all over, Start all over I was afraid of the dark All that I want, All that I want And when the daylight comes I'll have to go But tonight I'm gonna hold you so close Cause in the daylight we'll be on our own But tonight I need to hold you so close And when the daylight comes I'll have to go But tonight I'm gonna hold you so close Cause in the daylight we'll be on our own But tonight I need to hold you so close Oh-woah, Oh-woah, Oh-woah Ohhhhhh Oh-woah, Oh-woah, Oh-woah Ohhhhhh Oh-woah, Oh-woah, Oh-woah Ohhhhhh Oh-woah, Oh-woah, Oh-woah Ohhhhhh
